method.name: count
method.shortdesc: Displays the number of elements in the Table.

parameters.name: to
parameters.shortdesc: The location of the new table relative to the reference object or within the container object.

parameters.name: reference
parameters.shortdesc: The reference object. Note: Required when the to value specifies before or after. Can accept: Table, XMLElement, XmlStory, TextFrame, Text, InsertionPoint, TextStyleRange, Paragraph, TextColumn, Line, Word, Character, Story or Cell.

parameters.name: withProperties
parameters.shortdesc: Initial values for properties of the new Table

method.name: item
method.shortdesc: Returns the Table with the specified index or name.

parameters.name: index
parameters.shortdesc: The index or name. Can accept: Long Integer or String.

method.name: itemByName
method.shortdesc: Returns the Table with the specified name.

method.name: itemByID
method.shortdesc: Returns the Table with the specified ID.

method.name: itemByRange
method.shortdesc: Returns the Tables within the specified range.

parameters.name: from
parameters.shortdesc: The Table, index, or name at the beginning of the range. Can accept: Table, Long Integer or String.

parameters.name: to
parameters.shortdesc: The Table, index, or name at the end of the range. Can accept: Table, Long Integer or String.

method.name: firstItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the first Table in the collection.

method.name: lastItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the last Table in the collection.

method.name: middleItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the middle Table in the collection.

method.name: previousItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the Table with the index previous to the specified index.

parameters.name: obj
parameters.shortdesc: The index of the Table that follows the desired Table.

method.name: nextItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the Table whose index follows the specified Table in the collection.

parameters.name: obj
parameters.shortdesc: The Table whose index comes before the desired Table.

method.name: anyItem
method.shortdesc: Returns any Table in the collection.

method.name: everyItem
method.shortdesc: Returns every Table in the collection.

method.name: toSource
method.shortdesc: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the Table.
Returns the Table with the specified index.

property.name: length
property.shortdesc: The number of objects in the collection.
